robot_model_name.description: Property. The name of the robot model this scene is for

fixed_frame_transforms.description: Property. dditional frames for duplicating tf (with respect to the planning frame)

object_colors.description: Property. Attached objects, collision objects, even the octomap or collision map can have  colors associated to them. This array specifies them.

is_diff.description: Property. Flag indicating whether this scene is to be interpreted as a diff with respect to some other scene
